short_description: cov hair is a beauty salon based in sydney, australia.
long_description: who we are cov is a cutting edge salon dedicated to raw simplicity and originality, constantly driven by people and their beautiful varieties. nestled in the sweet streets of mosman and surry hills, cov is the living vision of french native and passionate entrepreneur, yoav cohen. originally hailing from the blue shores of marseille, cohen came to sydney eight years ago, armed with european groove and a concrete commitment to breathe new life into australia's hair industry. smooth homogeny, chemical trends and pimped out hair just don't fly here, instead, we pursue the un-done, endlessly seeking out new innovation and forms of creativity. awards at cov, we are dedicated to creating custom hair that works for you. whether you're working the 9-5, walking your poodle, or dancing through the tropics at midnight, wherever you take it, we want to make it right. we require all clients booked for any lightening services (exepct for on scalp bleach) to have clean and dry hair from the same day.

generated_description: cov hair, legally known as cov hair pty ltd., is a hair salon based in sydney, new south wales. established in 2014 by french native entrepreneur yoav cohen, the salon is located in mosman and surry hills. cov hair is dedicated to creating high-quality, minimalist haircuts and blow-dries that emphasize individuality and simplicity. the salon emphasizes innovation and creativity, focusing on the power of hair as a vessel of self-expression. cov hair offers a range of services including haircuts, blow-dries, and various hair treatments, with a commitment to providing personalized and respectful hair care.
